entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 6:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NNE 38 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
